release_notes: NEW: Drag & Drop Ordering - Organize collections, folders, and requests with drag & drop
NEW: Postman-compatible validation rules for organizing items
NEW: Order persists across restarts and import/export operations
NEW: Visual drop indicators show where items will be placed
NEW: Automatic count updates and smart tree refresh after moves
NEW: Circular reference prevention for folder operations
NEW: Comprehensive test coverage with 17 passing tests
FIXED: Database queries now use order_index for consistent sorting
IMPROVED: Better organization for large API projects with complex structures
